title: Achieve 90%+ Test Coverage with Comprehensive Test Suite
body:
## Description
Expand test coverage to 90%+ with unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.

## Test Categories

### Unit Tests (Target: 95%)
- All business logic
- Provider implementations
- Database operations
- API handlers
- Utility functions

### Integration Tests (Target: 85%)
- API endpoints
- Database migrations
- Provider communication
- File operations
- Authentication flows

### E2E Tests (Target: 70%)
- Critical user workflows
- Cross-browser testing
- Mobile responsiveness
- Performance testing
- Load testing

## Implementation Plan
1. Add missing unit tests
2. Create test fixtures
3. Mock external services
4. Add integration test suite
5. Expand E2E coverage
6. Add performance benchmarks

## Testing Infrastructure
- CI/CD test automation
- Coverage reporting
- Performance tracking
- Flaky test detection
- Test parallelization

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] 90%+ overall coverage
- [ ] All critical paths tested
- [ ] Mock implementations for providers
- [ ] Test data generators
- [ ] Performance benchmarks
- [ ] Load test scenarios
